gdpr_rules.name: PII Data Detection
gdpr_rules.description: Detect personally identifiable information in columns
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '\b[A-Za-z0-9._%+-]+@[A-Za-z0-9.-]+\.[A-Z|a-z]{2,}\b'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain email addresses (PII data)

gdpr_rules.name: Phone Number Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '\b\d{3}[-.]?\d{3}[-.]?\d{4}\b'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain phone numbers (PII data)

gdpr_rules.name: SSN Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '\b\d{3}-\d{2}-\d{4}\b'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain SSNs (PII data)

gdpr_rules.name: Credit Card Pattern
gdpr_rules.description: Checks for potential credit card numbers
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '\b\d{4}[-\s]?\d{4}[-\s]?\d{4}[-\s]?\d{4}\b'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain credit card numbers (PII data)

gdpr_rules.name: Password Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP 'password|pwd|pass'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain passwords (PII data)

gdpr_rules.name: Email Format Check
gdpr_rules.description: Validates email format in specified columns
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^[\w\.-]+@[\w\.-]+\.\w+$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid email formats

gdpr_rules.name: Date Format Check
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^[0-9]{4}-[0-9]{2}-[0-9]{2}$' OR STR_TO_DATE(column_name, '%Y-%m-%d') IS NULL
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid date formats

gdpr_rules.name: Phone Number Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '\b\d{3}[-.]?\d{3}[-.]?\d{4}\b'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid phone number formats

gdpr_rules.name: URL Format Check
gdpr_rules.description: Validates URL format in specified columns
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP 'https?://(?:[-\w.]|(?:%[\da-fA-F]{2}))+[^\s]*'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid URL formats

gdpr_rules.name: ZIP Code Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '\b\d{5}(?:-\d{4})?\b'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid ZIP code formats

gdpr_rules.name: HTML Tag Check
gdpr_rules.description: Detects HTML tags in text fields
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '<[^>]+>'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain HTML tags

gdpr_rules.name: SQL Injection Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE LOWER(column_name) REGEXP '\b(select|insert|update|delete|drop|union)\b'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain SQL injection patterns

gdpr_rules.name: Base64 Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^[A-Za-z0-9+/]{4}*(?:[A-Za-z0-9+/]{2}==|[A-Za-z0-9+/]{3}=)?$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain Base64 encoded strings

gdpr_rules.name: Unicode Control Chars
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '[\x00-\x1F\x7F]'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain Unicode control characters

gdpr_rules.name: File Path Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '[A-Za-z]:\\|/etc/|/var/|/tmp/'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain file paths

gdpr_rules.name: JWT Token Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP 'eyJ[A-Za-z0-9-_]*\.[A-Za-z0-9-_]*\.[A-Za-z0-9-_]*'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain JWT tokens

gdpr_rules.name: API Key Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '[a-zA-Z0-9]{32,}'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain API keys

gdpr_rules.name: MAC Address Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^([0-9A-Fa-f]{2}[:-]){5}([0-9A-Fa-f]{2})$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid MAC addresses

gdpr_rules.name: GUID Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid GUIDs

gdpr_rules.name: Hash Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^[a-fA-F0-9]{32}$|^[a-fA-F0-9]{40}$|^[a-fA-F0-9]{64}$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain hash values

gdpr_rules.name: XML Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '<\?xml.*\?>'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain XML content

gdpr_rules.name: Binary Data Pattern
gdpr_rules.description: Detects binary data in text fields
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '[\x00-\x08\x0B\x0C\x0E-\x1F]'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain binary data

gdpr_rules.name: Script Tag Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '(?i)<script.*?>.*?</script>'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain script tags

gdpr_rules.name: IBAN Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^[A-Z]{2}\d{2}[A-Z0-9]{4}\d{7}([A-Z0-9]?){0,16}$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid IBANs

gdpr_rules.name: Vehicle VIN Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^[A-HJ-NPR-Z0-9]{17}$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid VINs

gdpr_rules.name: OAuth Token Pattern
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '(Bearer|OAuth) [A-Za-z0-9\-._~+/]+'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain OAuth tokens

gdpr_rules.name: Geographic Coordinates
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^-?([1-8]?\d(\.\d+)?|90(\.0+)?),\s*-?(180(\.0+)?|((1[0-7]\d)|([1-9]?\d))(\.\d+)?)$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid coordinates

gdpr_rules.name: Color Code Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^#([A-Fa-f0-9]{6}|[A-Fa-f0-9]{3})$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid color codes

gdpr_rules.name: ISBN Format
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid ISBNs

gdpr_rules.name: Domain Name Format
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name REGEXP '^(?:[a-z0-9](?:[a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9])?\.)+[a-z0-9][a-z0-9-]{0,61}[a-z0-9]$'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain invalid domain names

gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE LOWER(column_name) REGEXP 'biometric template|fingerprint template|iris scan|facial recognition data'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain biometric template data

gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE LOWER(column_name) REGEXP 'health insurance|medical coverage|insurance policy|healthcare provider|insurance id'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain health insurance data

gdpr_rules.name: Bank Account Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].str.contains(r'bank account|iban|swift code|routing number|account number', case=False)
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE LOWER(column_name) REGEXP 'bank account|iban|swift code|routing number|account number'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain bank account data

gdpr_rules.name: Vehicle Identifier Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].str.contains(r'vehicle id|vin number|license plate|registration number|chassis number', case=False)
gdpr_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE LOWER(column_name) REGEXP 'vehicle id|vin number|license plate|registration number|chassis number'
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain vehicle identifier data

gdpr_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].str.contains(r'property deed|land registry|ownership title|property id|real estate', case=False)
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain property ownership data

gdpr_rules.name: Investment Portfolio Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].str.contains(r'investment portfolio|stock holdings|securities account|trading account|investment id', case=False)
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain investment portfolio data

gdpr_rules.name: Tax Information Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].str.contains(r'tax id|tax number|tax return|tax record|tax filing', case=False)
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain tax information data

gdpr_rules.name: Military Service Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].str.contains(r'military service|service number|military id|veteran status|military rank', case=False)
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain military service data

gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain pension information data

gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain welfare benefits data

gdpr_rules.name: Digital Identity Detection
gdpr_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].str.contains(r'digital identity|digital certificate|digital signature|electronic id|digital passport', case=False)
gdpr_rules.message: Column may contain digital identity data

data_quality_rules.name: No Missing Values
data_quality_rules.description: Check for missing values in required fields
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM table_name WHERE column_name IS NULL
data_quality_rules.message: Missing values found in required field

data_quality_rules.name: Date Format Check
data_quality_rules.description: Ensure dates are in the correct format (YYYY-MM-DD)
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE STR_TO_DATE(column_name, '%Y-%m-%d') IS NULL

data_quality_rules.name: Email Format Check
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^[\w\.-]+@[\w\.-]+\.\w+$'

data_quality_rules.name: Decimal Precision Check
data_quality_rules.description: Validates decimal numbers have correct precision
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^-?\d+\.\d{2}$'
data_quality_rules.message: Values should have exactly 2 decimal places

data_quality_rules.name: Time Format Check
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^([01]\d|2[0-3]):([0-5]\d):([0-5]\d)$'
data_quality_rules.message: Time values should be in HH:MM:SS format

data_quality_rules.name: URL Format Check
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^https?://(?:www\.)?[\w\d\-_]+\.\w{2,}(?:/[\w\d\-._/?%=]*)?$'

data_quality_rules.name: Currency Format Check
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^\$\d+\.\d{2}$'

data_quality_rules.name: Percentage Range Check
data_quality_rules.description: Validates percentage values are between 0 and 100
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT BETWEEN 0 AND 100
data_quality_rules.message: Percentage values should be between 0 and 100

data_quality_rules.name: String Length Check
data_quality_rules.description: Validates string length is within limits
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE LENGTH(column_name) NOT BETWEEN 1 AND 255
data_quality_rules.message: String length should be between 1 and 255 characters

data_quality_rules.name: Alphanumeric Check
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^[a-zA-Z0-9]+$'
data_quality_rules.message: Values should contain only letters and numbers

data_quality_rules.name: Date Range Check
data_quality_rules.description: Validates dates are within acceptable range
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT BETWEEN '1900-01-01' AND '2100-12-31'

data_quality_rules.name: Case Consistency Check
data_quality_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE column_name NOT REGEXP '^[A-Z]+$' AND column_name NOT REGEXP '^[a-z]+$'
data_quality_rules.message: Text should be consistently upper or lower case

data_quality_rules.name: Whitespace Check
data_quality_rules.message: Values should not have leading or trailing whitespace

data_quality_rules.name: Special Character Check
data_quality_rules.message: Values should not contain special characters

data_quality_rules.name: Word Count Check
data_quality_rules.description: Validates number of words in text
data_quality_rules.message: Text should contain between 1 and 100 words

data_quality_rules.name: Duplicate Words Check
data_quality_rules.message: Text should not contain consecutive duplicate words

data_quality_rules.name: Number Format Check
data_quality_rules.message: Numbers should be properly formatted with commas and decimals

data_quality_rules.name: JSON Format Check
data_quality_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].apply(lambda x: bool(json.loads(x)) if isinstance(x, str) else False)
data_quality_rules.message: Values should be valid JSON strings

validation_rules.name: Salary Range Check
validation_rules.description: Ensure salaries are within valid range

validation_rules.name: Department ID Check
validation_rules.description: Verify department IDs exist in departments table

validation_rules.name: Employee Age Check
validation_rules.description: Validate employee age is between 18 and 65

validation_rules.name: Email Format Validation
validation_rules.description: Validate email addresses follow correct format

validation_rules.name: Phone Number Format
validation_rules.description: Validate phone numbers follow correct format

validation_rules.name: Date Format Check
validation_rules.description: Validate dates follow YYYY-MM-DD format

validation_rules.name: Numeric Range Check
validation_rules.description: Validate numeric values fall within specified range

validation_rules.name: String Length Check
validation_rules.description: Validate string length meets requirements

validation_rules.name: Boolean Value Check
validation_rules.description: Validate boolean fields contain valid values

validation_rules.name: Currency Format Check
validation_rules.description: Validate currency values follow correct format

validation_rules.name: ZIP Code Format
validation_rules.description: Validate ZIP codes follow correct format

validation_rules.name: URL Format Check
validation_rules.description: Validate URLs follow correct format

validation_rules.name: IP Address Format
validation_rules.description: Validate IP addresses follow correct format

validation_rules.name: Password Strength Check
validation_rules.description: Validate password meets strength requirements
validation_rules.message: Password does not meet strength requirements

validation_rules.name: Credit Card Format
validation_rules.description: Validate credit card number format

validation_rules.name: SSN Format
validation_rules.description: Validate Social Security Number format

validation_rules.name: Time Format
validation_rules.description: Validate time format (HH:MM:SS)

validation_rules.name: Percentage Format
validation_rules.description: Validate percentage values
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT percentage FROM table_name WHERE percentage NOT BETWEEN 0 AND 100

validation_rules.name: ISBN Format
validation_rules.description: Validate ISBN format

validation_rules.name: GUID Format
validation_rules.description: Validate GUID format
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT guid FROM table_name WHERE guid NOT REGEXP '^[0-9a-fA-F]{8}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{4}-[0-9a-fA-F]{12}$'

validation_rules.name: MAC Address Format
validation_rules.description: Validate MAC address format
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT mac_address FROM table_name WHERE mac_address NOT REGEXP '^([0-9A-Fa-f]{2}[:-]){5}([0-9A-Fa-f]{2})$'

validation_rules.name: Hexadecimal Format
validation_rules.description: Validate hexadecimal format
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT hex_value FROM table_name WHERE hex_value NOT REGEXP '^#?([a-fA-F0-9]{6}|[a-fA-F0-9]{3})$'

validation_rules.name: JSON Format
validation_rules.description: Validate JSON string format
validation_rules.validation_code: df['json_data'].apply(lambda x: bool(json.loads(x)) if isinstance(x, str) else False)
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT json_data FROM table_name WHERE JSON_VALID(json_data) = 0

validation_rules.name: Email Domain Check
validation_rules.description: Validates that email domains are from allowed list
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT email FROM table_name WHERE SUBSTRING_INDEX(email, '@', -1) NOT IN (SELECT domain FROM allowed_domains)

validation_rules.name: Country Code Check
validation_rules.description: Validates that country codes are valid ISO codes
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT country FROM table_name WHERE country NOT IN (SELECT code FROM iso_country_codes)

validation_rules.name: JSON Format Check
validation_rules.description: Validates that string values are valid JSON
validation_rules.validation_code: df[column_name].apply(lambda x: bool(json.loads(x)) if isinstance(x, str) else False)
validation_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT column_name FROM table_name WHERE JSON_VALID(column_name) = 0
validation_rules.message: Values should be valid JSON strings

business_rules.name: Manager Assignment
business_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT m.manager_id FROM table_name m LEFT JOIN table_name e ON m.manager_id = e.employee_id WHERE e.employee_id IS NULL

people_table_rules.name: Age Range Check
people_table_rules.description: Validates that age is within reasonable range (18-100)
people_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM people_table WHERE age NOT BETWEEN 18 AND 100
people_table_rules.message: Age values outside valid range detected

assignments_table_rules.name: Assignment Duration
assignments_table_rules.description: Validates assignment duration is within policy limits
assignments_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM assignments_table WHERE DATEDIFF(end_date, start_date) > @max_assignment_days

assignments_table_rules.name: Project Code Format
assignments_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT project_code FROM assignments_table WHERE project_code NOT REGEXP '^P-\d{4}-\d{2}$'

assignments_table_rules.name: Assignment Overlap
assignments_table_rules.description: Checks for overlapping assignments for same person
assignments_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT a1.employee_id FROM assignments_table a1 JOIN assignments_table a2 ON a1.employee_id = a2.employee_id WHERE a1.id != a2.id AND a1.start_date < a2.end_date AND a2.start_date < a1.end_date

address_table_rules.name: Postal Code Format
address_table_rules.description: Validates postal code format by country
address_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM address_table a JOIN postal_code_patterns p ON a.country = p.country WHERE a.postal_code NOT REGEXP p.pattern

address_table_rules.name: Country Code
address_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT country FROM address_table WHERE country NOT IN (SELECT code FROM iso_country_codes)

address_table_rules.name: State/Province Format
address_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT a.state_province FROM address_table a JOIN state_province_codes s ON a.country = s.country WHERE a.state_province NOT IN (SELECT code FROM s.valid_codes)

employee_table_rules.name: Salary Range Check
employee_table_rules.description: Validates salary is within acceptable range by job grade
employee_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT e.* FROM employee_table e JOIN salary_ranges s ON e.job_grade = s.grade WHERE e.salary NOT BETWEEN s.min_salary AND s.max_salary
employee_table_rules.message: Salary outside acceptable range for job grade

employee_table_rules.name: Department Assignment
employee_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT e.* FROM employee_table e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.department_id = d.id WHERE d.id IS NULL

payroll_table_rules.name: Payment Amount Check
payroll_table_rules.description: Validates payment amounts against salary records
payroll_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT p.employee_id FROM payroll_table p JOIN employee_table e ON p.employee_id = e.id GROUP BY p.employee_id HAVING SUM(p.payment_amount) > e.annual_salary

payroll_table_rules.name: Payment Date Sequence
payroll_table_rules.description: Validates payment dates are in correct sequence
payroll_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT p1.* FROM payroll_table p1 JOIN payroll_table p2 ON p1.employee_id = p2.employee_id WHERE p1.payment_date < p2.payment_date AND p1.id > p2.id

leave_table_rules.name: Leave Balance Check
leave_table_rules.description: Validates leave request against available balance
leave_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT l.employee_id FROM leave_table l JOIN employee_balance e ON l.employee_id = e.employee_id GROUP BY l.employee_id HAVING SUM(l.days_requested) > e.leave_balance

leave_table_rules.name: Leave Date Validation
leave_table_rules.description: Ensures leave start date is before end date
leave_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM leave_table WHERE start_date >= end_date

performance_table_rules.name: Rating Range Check
performance_table_rules.description: Validates performance ratings are within valid range (1-5)
performance_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM performance_table WHERE rating NOT BETWEEN 1 AND 5

performance_table_rules.name: Review Period Check
performance_table_rules.description: Validates review period is within fiscal year
performance_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM performance_table WHERE YEAR(review_date) != fiscal_year

training_table_rules.name: Training Completion Check
training_table_rules.description: Validates mandatory training completion within deadline
training_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM training_table WHERE completion_date > deadline_date OR completion_date IS NULL
training_table_rules.message: Mandatory training not completed by deadline

training_table_rules.name: Prerequisites Check
training_table_rules.validation_code: df.apply(lambda x: all(prereq in df[df['employee_id'] == x['employee_id']]['completed_training_id'] for prereq in training_prerequisites[x['training_id']]), axis=1)
training_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT t.* FROM training_table t LEFT JOIN training_prerequisites p ON t.training_id = p.training_id WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM training_completion c WHERE c.employee_id = t.employee_id AND c.training_id = p.prerequisite_id)

certification_table_rules.name: Certification Expiry Check
certification_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM certification_table WHERE expiry_date <= CURRENT_DATE

certification_table_rules.name: Certification Authority Check
certification_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT * FROM certification_table WHERE issuing_authority NOT IN (SELECT authority_name FROM approved_certification_authorities)

cross_table_rules.name: Manager Hierarchy Check
cross_table_rules.description: Validates manager hierarchy is consistent across departments
cross_table_rules.validation_code_sql: SELECT e.* FROM employee_table e JOIN department_table d ON e.manager_id = d.department_head_id WHERE e.department_id != d.department_id

complex_business_rules.name: Overtime Eligibility
complex_business_rules.description: Validates overtime assignments based on employment type and regulations
complex_business_rules.validation_code_sql:
SELECT * FROM employee_assignments 
WHERE (employment_type = 'contractor' AND overtime_hours > 0)
   OR (employment_type = 'part_time' AND overtime_hours > 20)
   OR (employment_type = 'full_time' AND overtime_hours > 40)

complex_business_rules.name: Resource Allocation Check
complex_business_rules.description: Validates resource allocation across projects considering skills and availability
complex_business_rules.validation_code:
def validate_resource_allocation(df_assignments, df_skills, df_projects):
    # Check skill requirements
    skill_match = df_assignments.merge(df_skills, on='employee_id').merge(
        df_projects[['project_id', 'required_skills']], on='project_id'
    ).apply(lambda x: set(x['skills']).intersection(x['required_skills']), axis=1)
    
    # Check availability
    availability = df_assignments.groupby('employee_id')['allocation_percentage'].sum() <= 100
    
    return skill_match.map(len) > 0 & availability
complex_business_rules.validation_code_sql:
WITH resource_allocation AS (
    SELECT 
        employee_id,
        SUM(allocation_percentage) as total_allocation
    FROM project_assignments
    GROUP BY employee_id
),
skill_requirements AS (
    SELECT 
        pa.employee_id,
        COUNT(DISTINCT ps.skill_id) as matching_skills
    FROM project_assignments pa
    JOIN project_skills ps ON pa.project_id = ps.project_id
    JOIN employee_skills es ON pa.employee_id = es.employee_id 
        AND ps.skill_id = es.skill_id
    GROUP BY pa.employee_id
)
SELECT 
    ra.employee_id
FROM resource_allocation ra
LEFT JOIN skill_requirements sr ON ra.employee_id = sr.employee_id
WHERE ra.total_allocation > 100 
   OR sr.matching_skills = 0
